title: Lemon cake with lemon curd and double cream
description: A stunning three-tiered cake filled with homemade lemon curd and cream. To save time, use a good quality ready-made lemon curd.
ingredients: 350g/12oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
4 lemons, zest only, plus juice of 2 lemons
3 large pieces candied lemon peel , finely chopped
200g/7oz icing sugar, sifted, plus extra for dusting
